list.name: (start)
list.query: select text,generatorHost,application,title FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*started$/ GROUP BY generatorHost,application,title)

list.name: (stop)
list.query: select "text", "generatorHost", "application" FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*ended$/ GROUP BY  "generatorHost", "application")

seriesOverrides.alias: Sum Duration per minute by Query / Sum Duration per minute by DB

targets.alias: Sum Duration per minute by Query
targets.query: SELECT sum("duration_10m") as "Sum Duration per minute by Query" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^$datname$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "usename" =~ /^$usename$/ AND "queryid" =~ /^$queryid$/ AND "query_md5" =~ /^$query_md5$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "query_md5" fill(null)

params: Sum Duration per minute by Query

targets.alias: Sum Duration per minute by DB
targets.query: SELECT sum("duration_10m") as "Sum Duration per minute by DB" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^$datname$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "usename" =~ /^$usename$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "query_md5" fill(null)

params: Sum Duration per minute by DB

binary.left: Sum Duration per minute by Query
binary.right: Sum Duration per minute by DB

panels.description:
Средняя интенсивность вызовов запроса.
Измеряется в запросах в сек (RPS)
panels.title: Query Calls
Sum: Query Duration / min with Std Dev

panels.description:
Средняя интенсивность вызовов запроса.
Измеряется в запросах в сек (RPS)
panels.title: Query Calls

panels.description: Среднее значение для всех хостов, баз данных, текстов запроса. Для данного queryid
panels.title: Avg (Query Duration)

targets.query: SELECT last("calls_sum") as "calls" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_1d" WHERE ("query_md5" =~ /^$query_md5$/ AND "queryid" =~ /^$queryid$/ AND "datname" =~ /^$datname$/) GROUP BY "query"

SELECT last("calls") as "calls" FROM "1d"."pg_stat_statements_query_10m" WHERE ("query_md5" =~ /^${query_md5:regex}$/ AND "queryid" =~ /^${queryid:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/) GROUP BY "query"

panels.title: Детальная статистика по QueryID = ${queryid} (есть данные только за последние 7 дней)

seriesOverrides.alias: Sum Duration per minute by Query / Sum Duration per minute by DB

targets.alias: Sum Duration per minute by Query
targets.query: SELECT sum("duration_10m") as "Sum Duration per minute by Query" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^$datname$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "usename" =~ /^$usename$/ AND "queryid" =~ /^$queryid$/ AND "query_md5" =~ /^$query_md5$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "query_md5" fill(null)

params: Sum Duration per minute by Query

targets.alias: Sum Duration per minute by DB
targets.query: SELECT sum("duration_10m") as "Sum Duration per minute by DB" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^$datname$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "usename" =~ /^$usename$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "query_md5" fill(null)

params: Sum Duration per minute by DB

binary.left: Sum Duration per minute by Query
binary.right: Sum Duration per minute by DB

panels.description:
Средняя интенсивность вызовов запроса за минуту.
Измеряется в запросах в сек (RPS)
panels.title: Query Calls

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "queryid"=~/^${queryid:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
list.label: PostgreSQL host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "queryid"=~/^${queryid:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "queryid"=~/^${queryid:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")
list.label: PostgreSQL DB
list.name: datname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "queryid"=~/^${queryid:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE $timeFilter AND "queryid"=~/^${queryid:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  GROUP BY "usename")
list.label: PostgreSQL User
list.name: usename
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE $timeFilter AND "queryid"=~/^${queryid:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  GROUP BY "usename")
list.tagValuesQuery: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("calls") FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${tag:regex}$/  AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ GROUP BY "usename")
list.tagsQuery: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls") FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/  AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ GROUP BY "datname")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("query_md5") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "queryid" =~ /^${queryid:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "query_md5")
list.name: query_md5
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("query_md5") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "queryid" =~ /^${queryid:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "query_md5")
